reviews.content: it is simply sorted and knowledgeable session

This course covers so many tools and technologies that are a must know for every software professional or those aspiring to enter software field. Instructor Bharath makes the concepts easy to understand and course is more engaging and interesting going forward. I'd like to thank Bharath for his efforts throughout the course and absolutely one of the best DevOps courses to go for.
Excellent explanation and courses giving detailed understanding, good for DevOps beginners.

A great course by Bharath .Covered a wide variety of topics backed by excellent examples. A very impressive and a brilliant course. Covered a wide range of tools. All concepts were very well explained
Good course
Its too basic. Will have to go through other tutorials to get a moderate understanding in each of the tools described here.
this is amazing course
Bharath teaching is so awesome and easily understandable and I appreciate him for that. Very nice course learned a lot. Thank you Bharath.

the content is always going to be the same, but the way it is organized, delivered, explained is just fantastically different.. I have gone through many other videos but this one is really good and nicely put together.
Great course which covers a lot of dev ops topics which could be helpful for any developer.
It's a great course for a new devops engineer like me to be introduced to main concepts! Thank you so much!
good
Good learning approach for microservices and devops
Voice and video both are very clear
I would say I hopped course by course..no one has ever explained things so easily.
Awesome!!!!
Very good explanation, ease for understand, greeat teacher!
great
Excellent explanation
An excellent beginners course on DEVOPS.
